00038 #if !defined(MYSQLPP_MYSQLPP_H)
00039 #define MYSQLPP_MYSQLPP_H
00040 
00041 // Encode MySQL++ library version number.  MYSQLPP_VERSION macro takes
00042 // major, minor and bugfix numbers (e.g. 1, 2, and 3) and encodes them
00043 // like 0x010203.  MYSQLPP_LIB_VERSION is the current library version
00044 // in the same scheme, so between these two macros you can create
00045 // conditional code based on the MySQL++ library version.
00046 #define MYSQLPP_VERSION(major, minor, bugfix) \
00047                 (((major) << 16) | ((minor) << 8) | (bugfix))
00048 #define MYSQLPP_LIB_VERSION MYSQLPP_VERSION(2, 1, 0)
00049 
00050 // This #include order gives the fewest redundancies in the #include
00051 // dependency chain.
00052 #include "connection.h"
00053 #include "query.h"
00054 #include "sql_types.h"
00055 
00056 #endif // !defined(MYSQLPP_MYSQLPP_H)
